name: jiffy  extra moist carrot cake
instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees, mix together the cake mix , pudding , nutmeg and cinnamon, add eggs , oil and water to this mixture, mix on medium speed for 1 minute, add the pineapple , carrots , pecans and coconut, blend well, pour into a greased 9 inch round cake pan, bake 25 to 30 minutes , until tooth pick inserted in the center comes out clean
ingredients: yellow cake mix, vanilla instant pudding mix, nutmeg, cinnamon, eggs, oil, water, crushed pineapple, carrot, pecans, coconut
